General.Name: Sichuan Furong Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Furong Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of aluminum structural parts for consumer electronics products. Its products are used as shells, backplanes, and middle frames of consumer electronics products, such as smart phones, tablets, and notebook computers, as well as smart wearables. The company also engages in the processing, manufacturing, and casting of non-ferrous metals and alloys; manufacturing and sale of mold; processing of spare parts, and mechanical parts and components; recycling, processing, sale of renewable resources; and processing of metal waste and debris. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Chongzhou, China. Sichuan Furong Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Fujian Nanping Aluminum Co., Ltd.
